Payer.PersonalAcc: select top 1 NUM_ACC from dbo.Account where rest = (select min(rest) from dbo.Account where substring(NUM_ACC,1,1) = '4' and substring(NUM_ACC,1,5) <> '40101')

Payee.BIC: select top 3 NEWNUM from dbo.BNKSEEK where substring(NEWNUM,1,4) = substring('@', 1, 4) and UER in ('2','3','4','5') and NEWNUM <> '@'

Payer.PersonalAcc: select top 1 NUM_ACC from dbo.Account where rest = (select min(rest) from dbo.Account where substring(NUM_ACC,1,1) = '4' and substring(NUM_ACC,1,5) <> '40101')

Payee.BIC: select top 3 NEWNUM from dbo.BNKSEEK where substring(NEWNUM,1,4) = substring('@', 1, 4) and UER in ('2','3','4','5') and NEWNUM <> '@'

Payer.PersonalAcc: select top 1 NUM_ACC from dbo.Account where rest = (select min(rest) from dbo.Account where substring(NUM_ACC,1,1) = '4' and substring(NUM_ACC,1,5) <> '40101')

Payee.BIC: select top 3 NEWNUM from dbo.BNKSEEK where substring(NEWNUM,1,4) = substring('@', 1, 4) and UER in ('2','3','4','5') and NEWNUM <> '@'
